reasoning.description: The reasoning and chain-of-thought of your new outline creation.

create.description: Whether to create a new chapter or not. If true, the chapter will be created with the provided name.

content.description: A one-sentence description of the new chapter content. This should be a brief summary of what the chapter is, and is going to be about. When 'create' is set to false, this field should be empty.

new_sections.description: A list of new sections to be added to the chapter. You will only need one section most of the time

items.description: A single section of the chapter. This should be a one-sentence summary of what the section is about. It should be a brief general summary of the trend of the story, and should not contain specific details from the main body of the story.

predicted_sections.description: A list of different predictions of the next section that you think will be added to the outline later

items.description: A single section of the chapter. This should be a one-sentence summary of what the section is about. It should be in similar style as the new sections.
